dcterms:description: A large-scale, multi-modality dataset that includes images from vehicles and roadside units, focusing on the DAIR-V2X-I track which contains images from mounted cameras for roadside perception.
dcterms:title: DAIR-V2X

dcterms:creator: X. Ye
M. Shu
H. Li
Y. Shi
Y. Li
G. Wang
X. Tan
E. Ding
dcterms:description: The Rope3D dataset is designed for roadside perception and monocular 3D object detection tasks, containing over 500k images with 3D bounding boxes from various intersections.
dcterms:title: Rope3D

dcterms:creator: H. Caesar
V. Bankiti
A. H. Lang
S. Vora
V. E. Liong
Q. Xu
A. Krishnan
Y. Pan
G. Baldan
O. Beijbom
dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, containing data from multiple sensors including cameras, LiDAR, and radars, with a focus on 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:creator: Y. Dong
C. Kang
J. Zhang
Z. Zhu
Y. Wang
X. Yang
H. Su
X. Wei
J. Zhu
dcterms:description: nuScenes-C benchmarks the robustness of 3D object detection against common corruptions in autonomous driving, presenting various types of corruptions to evaluate the performance of detectors.
dcterms:title: nuScenes-C
